PetProfile.title: PetProfile
PetProfile.description: Represents a pet's profile for the memorial website.

animalType.description: The type of animal (e.g., dog, cat).

birthDate.description: The birth date of the pet in ISO 8601 format.

cremationDate.description: The date the pet was cremated in ISO 8601 format.

tree.description: The memorial tree planted for the pet.

shortDescription.description: A short description or farewell message for the pet.

fullDescription.description: A full description or memorial text for the pet.

imageUrls.description: An array of image URLs for the pet's gallery.

memorialCode.description: A unique code for the memorial, e.g., #001

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who created this memorial.

definition.description: A root collection storing all pet memorial profiles. Publicly readable, but writable only by authenticated admin users.
